title: Orchid
description: Orchids are one of the largest families of flowering plants with over 25,000 species. They are known for their beautiful and diverse flowers.

title: Pitcher Plant
description: Pitcher plants are carnivorous plants that have modified leaves known as pitfall trapsâ€”a prey-trapping mechanism featuring a deep cavity filled with digestive liquid.

title: Hibiscus
description: Hibiscus is a genus of flowering plants in the mallow family, Malvaceae. The genus is quite large, comprising several hundred species.
